name: Sustainable Deadline
description:
Research-Creation Prototype for Concordia's CART 410 - 2020.

You're a Graphic Designer. Your company wants to switch into sustainable packaging, and your Lead Graphic Designer gives you one month to convince an expert to join in with you during a collaboration project. Who would you choose? Can you convince them?

As a collaboration between graphic design and video game narrative, our project has two main purposes. On one hand, this project strives to explore the different ways that eco-packaging in graphic design can be explored and integrated into practical projects, not only between graphic designers but also on an interdisciplinary level. On the other hand, this project aims to question how storytelling in video games can be effectively conveyed without simulating the physical environment, using the aforementioned research results as material to build an entertaining and convincing narrative experience.
